article.title: SAIC Awarded BPA to Support EPA
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Science Applications International Corporation (SAIC) has been awarded a prime multiple-award blanket purchase agreement (BPA) by the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) to support the Office of Environmental Information by providing a wide range of information technology services. The BPA was awarded under the Information Technology Solutions-Environmental Protection Agency II contract. It has a seven-year period of performance and a ceiling value of $955 million for all awardees.
